
```{r}

plot(data, type="p", main="Scatter Plot", xlab = "Average Weekly Temperature / Â°C", ylab="Number of cases")

```

```{r}

library("broom")
dengue1 <- lm(data[,1]~data[,2])
summary(dengue1)

tidy(dengue1)
glance(dengue1)
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(dengue1)
```
